articles.description: Apple is gearing up to give your Apple Watch some of your iPhone's standout features.
articles.content:
In addition to the Control Center changes, watchOS 26 will bring quite a few other features to your Apple Watch.
This includes a “Wrist Flick,” a quick movement of flicking your wrist, which dismiss… [+772 chars]
